content.en_US:
Obtained by cracking [[crude oil|Crude Oil]] in a [[catalytic cracking tower|Catalytic Cracking Tower]]. It is then heated and [[refined|Oil Refinery]], similar to crude oil. The process of refining cracked oil is called [[advanced oil processing|Advanced Oil Processing]] ("Oil 2"), and it enables the creation of new materials with the production of [[aromatic hydrocarbons|Aromatic Hydrocarbons]] and [[unsaturated hydrocarbons|Unsaturated Hydrocarbons]].

Alternatively, it can be treated in the [[hydrotreater|Hydrotreater]] to produce desulfurized cracked oil ("Oil 3.5").
